casebody.data:
In the Matter of T.M.H. No. 530P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2007. Debra J. Radtke, Fayetteville, for Mother. Deborah Koenig, Linden, for Guardian ad Litem.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 652 S.E.2d 1.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of November 2007 by Respondent (Father) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of November 2007."
